category.category_en: Wood processing and furniture manufacturing industry equipment

title: Spindle shaper machine US-SM-120T
short_description: This US-SM-120T equipment is also used for processing board corners. The difference between this equipment and others is that it has a movable work table and is very convenient to operate. The maximum milling height is 120 mm, the motor power is 4 kW, and the size of the moving table is 1150*300 mm. The weight of the equipment is 465 kg, and its dimensions are 1672*760*1050 mm.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-SM-120T uskuna ham taxta burchaklariga ishlov berish uchun xizmat qiladi. Bu uskunaning boshqalaridan farqi shuki, unda harakatlanuvchi ish stoli mavjud va ishlash juda qulay. Maksimal frezerlash balandligi 120 mm, motor quvvati 4 kW va harakatlanuvchi ish stoli o'lchami 1150*300 mm ni tashkil etadi. Uskuna vazni 465 kg, o'lchami esa 1672*760*1050 mm dan iborat.
short_description_ru: Данное оборудование US-SM-120T также используется для обработки углов плит. Отличие этого оборудования от других в том, что оно имеет подвижный рабочий стол и очень удобно работать. Максимальная высота фрезерования 120 мм, мощность двигателя 4 кВт, размер подвижного стола 1150*300 мм. Вес оборудования составляет 465 кг, а его размеры – 1672*760*1050 мм.
short_description_en: This US-SM-120T equipment is also used for processing board corners. The difference between this equipment and others is that it has a movable work table and is very convenient to operate. The maximum milling height is 120 mm, the motor power is 4 kW, and the size of the moving table is 1150*300 mm. The weight of the equipment is 465 kg, and its dimensions are 1672*760*1050 mm.
long_description:
This US-SM-120T equipment is also used for processing board corners. The difference between this equipment and others is that it has a movable work table and is very convenient to operate. The maximum milling height is 120 mm, the motor power is 4 kW, and the size of the moving table is 1150*300 mm. The weight of the equipment is 465 kg, and its dimensions are 1672*760*1050 mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-SM-120T
Max. millig height................................................................................... 120 mm.........................................................................................................
Motor power 4 kW
Spindle speed 10000/8000/6000 rpm
Spindle diameter 35 mm
Cutting diameter 90 mm
Travelling table size 1150*300 mm
Weight 465 kg
Dimension 1672*760*1050 mm
long_description_uz:
Ushbu US-SM-120T uskuna ham taxta burchaklariga ishlov berish uchun xizmat qiladi. Bu uskunaning boshqalaridan farqi shuki, unda harakatlanuvchi ish stoli mavjud va ishlash juda qulay. Maksimal frezerlash balandligi 120 mm, motor quvvati 4 kW va harakatlanuvchi ish stoli o'lchami 1150*300 mm ni tashkil etadi. Uskuna vazni 465 kg, o'lchami esa 1672*760*1050 mm dan iborat.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-SM-120T
Maks. frezerlash balandligi............................................................................. 120 mm.........................................................................................................
Motor quvvati 4 kW
Shpindel tezligi 10000/8000/6000 oborot/min
Shpindel diametri 35 mm
Kesish diametri 90 mm
Harakatlanuvchi stol o'lchami 1150*300 mm
Vazni 465 kg
O'lchami 1672*760*1050 mm
long_description_ru:
Данное оборудование US-SM-120T также используется для обработки углов плит. Отличие этого оборудования от других в том, что оно имеет подвижный рабочий стол и очень удобно работать. Максимальная высота фрезерования 120 мм, мощность двигателя 4 кВт, размер подвижного стола 1150*300 мм. Вес оборудования составляет 465 кг, а его размеры – 1672*760*1050 мм.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-SM-120T
Макс. высота фрезерования..................................................................... 120 мм......................................................................................................
Мощность двигателя 4 кВт
Скорость шпинделя 10000/8000/6000 об/мин
Диаметр шпинделя 35 мм
Диаметр резки 90 мм
Размер движущегося стола 1150*300 мм
Масса 465 кг
Размер 1672*760*1050 мм
long_description_en:
This US-SM-120T equipment is also used for processing board corners. The difference between this equipment and others is that it has a movable work table and is very convenient to operate. The maximum milling height is 120 mm, the motor power is 4 kW, and the size of the moving table is 1150*300 mm. The weight of the equipment is 465 kg, and its dimensions are 1672*760*1050 mm.
